entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in trobuleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

entry.title: What influenced and inspired you to learn to code?
entry.content: My first interaction with programming was in college where I learned matlab to perform data analysis. I didn’t have any formal instruction at the time but I really enjoyed the challenge of coding. The need to understand all the parts of a particular problem, create a method to solve it, and then actually write the code is akin to an adventure. You have so much room to be creative and also to fail, repeatedly. The highs and low of programming are exciting! I’ve also always been a technology junkie, but not just the hardware. I am excited for the effect that technology and the web can have on society. Twitter was launched less than a decade ago but it’s effect on social movement and discussion is felt the whole world away. Excitement for the future is why I want to learn to code.
